title: Intro to Py
desc: We were given 7 very simple tasks as an introduction to Python.
code: #Ask user to input name, last name and date

# Write down following expressions in Python

#Ask user to input number and print out if number is divisible by 3 or not
#if it is not, write out first number bigger than input divisible by 3
print("First bigger number divisible by 3 is: " + str(n - n%3 + 3) + ".")
#Ask user to input rain probability for tommorow
#Depending on probability write out a message
#If probability value is bigger than 0.5, inform the user
#Add check to make sure probability is valid number
probability = float(input("Input a rain possiblity for tommorow: "))
print("Bring an umberella, it's going to rain.")
#Make sure that input is one of the three.
